channel.title: Wa..i-/.ti;ng (This Uprising Afterthought) - F0yders Music
channel.description: A little something to listen to after This Uprising. A little less messy, but still in the same boat. All feedback is appreciated. https://soundcloud.com/f0ydersmusic/wa-i-ti-ng-this-uprising

item.title: Wa..i-/.ti;ng (This Uprising Afterthought) - F0yders Music
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Liked

A good groove.

Feels a bit underdeveloped*, but still enjoyed it in its current form.

* Not suggesting anything major. I think it’s good precisely for its subtlety. But, maybe some additional subtle moments or layers.

 
[Edit: The more I listen to it (just started my 3rd listen), the more it grows on me. Nice work.

Edit 2: Particularly like that drop-out transition moment. Nice touch.
Also, like the fade in and fade out at the start and end. Shows an understanding that it’s a mellow groove.

Read full topic
